head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GRINBERG, PAUL IRVING

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GRINBERG, PAUL IRVING

block.p: GRINBERG-Paul Irving. On Monday, December 25th, 2000. Beloved husband of the late Barbara Jordan Grinberg, beloved father of sons Donald and Alan, daughter Kate, and beloved grandfather of Saskia, Kita, Alyssa, Maria, Andrew & Benjamin. A memorial service will be held at 11:00 AM on Friday, December 29 at the Cedar Lane Unitarian Universalist Church, 9601 Cedar Lane, Bethesda, Maryland. In lieu of flowers, contributions may be made to The Nature Conservancy, 4245 North Fairfax Drive, Suite 100, Arlington, VA. 22203, phone (800-628-6860, www.tnc.org).
